hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found #outside Ganon's Castle#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Blue Potion Bottle# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Spirit Temple#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Piece of Heart#.
